【考法 1】 vt. 确定方向，东方的, 使适应： to set or arrange in any determinate position especially in relation to the points of the compass; to make familiar with or adjusted to facts, principles, or a situation
【例】 orient students toward a career in medicine 指导学生从事医学的职业道路
【近】 accustom, familiarize, initiate, introduce, orientate
【反】 confuse 使迷惑
【记】 源自：rise，O 象太阳 + rise
